description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Windows Routing and Remote Access Service (RRAS) remote code execution vulnerability (CVE-2024-30022):

1. Install the appropriate update packages based on your system build number.
2. Ensure that your system is updated through Windows Update or download the updates from the provided links.
3. Restart your system to apply the patch effectively.

**Details**:
- The updates address a numeric truncation error that could allow remote code execution. 
- It is crucial to ensure your system is running a supported version of Windows before applying the updates. 
- Update packages can be found via the following links:
  - [KB5037788](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037788)
  - [KB5037770](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037770)
  - [KB5037768](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768)
  - [KB5037771](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037771)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure that administrative privileges are available for executing updates.
- Backup your data before proceeding with the update installation.
